articles.author: Damian Carrington
articles.title: Fossil fuels being subsidised at rate of $13m a minute, says IMF - The Guardian
articles.description: Oil, gas and coal benefited from $7tn in support in 2022 despite being primary cause of climate crisis
articles.content:
Fossil fuels benefited from record subsidies of $13m (£10.3m) a minute in 2022, according to the International Monetary Fund, despite being the primary cause of the climate crisis.
The IMF analysis … [+4323 chars]

articles.author: Michael Doran
articles.title: Qantas Orders Airbus A350s and Boeing 787s To Replace A330s and A380s - Simple Flying
articles.description: Speculation around fleet renewal at Qantas ended today when the airline announced it has ordered Airbus A350 and Boeing 787 widebodies.
articles.content:
Summary
  • Qantas has announced an underlying profit of AU$2.47 billion and will be using the funds to replace its fleet of A330 and A380 jets with Airbus A350 and Boeing 787 aircraft.
